law.catch_line: Effect of revocation or suspension of license by another jurisdiction in United States or Canada.
law.text: A person whose privilege to hunt or fish has been suspended or revoked by any jurisdiction within the United States or Canada shall not purchase or possess a license to hunt or fish, nor shall that person perform any act permitted by the license in Kentucky during the period of suspension or revocation.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 275, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1998.
